SELECT ANNOUNCE_NO, ANNOUNCE_NAME, ANNOUNCE_COUNT, MEMBER_NICKNAME,
CASE
WHEN SYSDATE - ANNOUNCE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - ANNOUNCE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - ANNOUNCE_DATE < 1 /24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - ANNOUNCE_DATE) * 24 * 60)|| '분 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - ANNOUNCE_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - ANNOUNCE_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(ANNOUNCE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END ANNOUNCE_DATE
FROM "ANNOUNCEMENT" B JOIN "MEMBER" M ON(B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.ANNOUNCE_DEL_FL ='N' ORDER BY ANNOUNCE_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "ANNOUNCEMENT"
JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO)
WHERE ANNOUNCE_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND ANNOUNCE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND ANNOUNCE_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%'
AND (ANNOUNCE_NAME LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%' OR ANNOUNCE_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{query} || '%')
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{query}||'%'

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, READ_COUNT, MEMBER_NICKNAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO ) COMMENT_COUNT,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "BOARD_LIKE" L WHERE L.BOARD_NO =B. BOARD_NO) LIKE_COUNT,
CASE
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 / 24 / 60 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60) || '초 전'
WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE < 1 /24 THEN FLOOR((SYSDATE - BOARD_WRITE_DATE) * 24 * 60)|| '분 전'
